column1: Family Of Thakurganj  is a 2019 Indian Hindi-language action drama film directed by Manoj K. Jha
column2: and produced by Ajay Kumar Singh. The film stars Jimmy Sheirgill and Mahie Gill
column3: and follows the influence of modern society on traditional values in a typical family.  Principal photography of the film began in October 2018 in Lucknow
column4: The creative director of this movie is Prince Singh and the film was released in India on 19 July 2019.
